# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
PR7575 23240-230988 Breakthrough Analyzer
## Reference Number
WS4073460330-Doc4279151020
## Amendment Number
2

### Solicitation and Tender Information
* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-27
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-17T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-11-15
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-09-30

### Procurement Details
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Product Description
The Department of Natural Resources has a requirement for a Breakthrough Analyzer (BTA). The instrument must be delivered to Ottawa, ON by March 29, 2024. Interested suppliers must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Statement of Requirement.

### Contact Information
For further information or clarification, please contact:
Andreas Psarras, Psarras2 (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: andreas.psarras2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Important Notes
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Canada Buys posting closing time. All bids must be submitted by 14:00 EST on November 17, 2023. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

### Document URL
The tender document is available on Ariba Discovery: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17847801?extsite=MTc4NDc4MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
